com.conichi.sdk.payment

Class CNIPaymentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conichi.sdk.payment.CNIPaymentManager

  • public class CNIPaymentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Payment manager which allows savin /removing/obtaining the payment instruments and synchronising their state with conichi Backend.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Clear all cached and user related data.

      Removes a credit card and updates cache.

      Saves a new credit card in conichi.
      <any> syncCards()
      It might happen that during addition of a new card it has successfully been added on payment provider's side, but could not be added to conichi.

    • Method Detail

      • getValidator

        public Validator getValidator()
        Provides validator to perform needed credit card validations.
        Returns:
        validatior instance

      • save

        public <any> save(CNICreditCardData data)
           throws CNICardInvalidException
        Saves a new credit card in conichi.
        Parameters:
        data - credit card data to save
        Returns:
        Single to subscribe
        Throws:
        CNICardInvalidException - in case of invalid data trying to be saved

      • removeCard

        public <any> removeCard(CNICreditCardData data)
        Removes a credit card and updates cache.
        Parameters:
        data - credit card to be removed
        Returns:
        Observable to subscribe

      • editCardAddress

        public <any> editCardAddress(java.lang.String cardId,
                             CNICardAddress address)
        Method uses Conichi API to edit card address
        Parameters:
        cardId - payment instrument id
        address - new address
        Returns:
        Observable to subscribe

      • syncCards

        public <any> syncCards()
        It might happen that during addition of a new card it has successfully been added on payment provider's side, but could not be added to conichi. In this case invocation of this method will synchronize cards between conichi and payment provider.
        Returns:
        observable which synchronizes credit card on the backend.

      • clearUserData

        public void clearUserData()
        Clear all cached and user related data. Normally, this method has to be called only when a conichi user has been logged out.
